message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair starting point!
You were too greedy, let's try a more balanced split this time!
Still a bit too skewed towards you, Bob!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You were closer this time, but I think I can do better!
You were closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
Getting closer, Bob! Let's try to meet in the middle again!
I think I've got a good feeling about this one, Alice!
You've got a good feeling, Bob? I think you're right!
